endpoints.description: Retrieve energy price forecasts for various time intervals and regions.
Submit a trade order specifying energy quantity, price, and other relevant parameters.
Modify an existing trade order using its unique identifier.
Cancel a specific trade order by providing its unique identifier.
Obtain analytics reports on energy distribution patterns and trends.
Generate customized analytics reports based on specified energy consumption criteria.
List registered energy producers along with their output capacities and availability.
Retrieve details of registered energy consumers and their consumption patterns.
Retrieve historical patterns and trends in energy markets for analysis.
Update user-specific settings and preferences related to service usage.
